original_text: And Samson said to them, “If this is what you do, I swear I will be avenged on you, and after that I will quit.”
korean_text: 삼손이 그들에게 이르되 너희가 이같이 행하였은즉 내가 너희에게 원수를 갚고야 말리라 하고

sentences.original_text: If this is what you do,
I swear I will be avenged on you,
and after that I will quit.”
